item.title: Documentation Makes Easy With MkDocs and GitLab Pages
item.description: Overview I created a static website using MkDocs and deployed to GitLab Pages. This is what I did: https://bemn-proof-of-concept.gitlab.io/mkdoc/. Table of Content MkDocs Preparation Up and Run Add a new page Theming Custom Resources GitLab Pages .gitlab-ci.yml Build and Deploy Conclustion MkDocs From MkDocs’ official website: MkDocs is a fast, simple and downright gorgeous static site generator that’s geared towards building project documentation.
